Package dataBase

Interface IdentifiablePersistency<T extends BusinessObject>

Type Parameters:
T - a class extending BusinessObject, with methods like getID() and getAllValues()
All Superinterfaces:
GeneralPersistency<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientXMLManipulation, ContainerXMLManipulation, HistoryXMLManipulation, PortXMLManipulation
public interface IdentifiablePersistency<T extends BusinessObject>
extends GeneralPersistency<T>
The interface for databases guaranteeing a maximum of one entry per unique ID
Author:
simon

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void deleteEntry​(long ID)
    Deletes the element with the given ID
    T getEntry​(long ID)
    Retrieves the a single element guaranteed to have the unique ID
    boolean isSavedID​(long ID)
    Checks whether the ID exists in the database

    Methods inherited from interface dataBase.GeneralPersistency

    newEntry, searchEntries, wipe

  • Method Details

    • getEntry

      T getEntry​(long ID) throws ElementSelectionException
      Retrieves the a single element guaranteed to have the unique ID
      Parameters:
      ID - - the ID of the element to be retrieved
      Returns:
      The matching element as a domain object
      Throws:
      ElementSelectionException - if the element could not be found, or the database is malformed with multiple entries with the ID

    • deleteEntry

      void deleteEntry​(long ID)
      Deletes the element with the given ID
      Parameters:
      ID - - the ID of the element to be deleted

    • isSavedID

      boolean isSavedID​(long ID)
      Checks whether the ID exists in the database
      Parameters:
      ID - - the ID to be searched for
      Returns:
      true if the ID was found, false otherwise
